transcript.name: t1
transcript.comment: This transcript is identical to the RefSeq transcript NM_001024921.3 but with the polyA tail removed.
The coding sequence of this transcript is identical to the coding sequence of Ensembl transcript ENST00000295955.13. The two transcripts differ at the 5'UTR.

contact.name: Karyn Megy
contact.address: Department of Haematology & NHS Blood and Transplant, University of Cambridge

annotation_set.comment: Annotation is based on Ensembl release 91 (GRCh38 primary assembly)

source.name: List of locus specific databases for RPL9
